Our project uses Svelte 5 for all UI components.
When generating Svelte code, please follow Svelte 5 syntax, features, and lifecycle (not Svelte 4).
When generating Svelte code, please ensure that the generated code is compatible with Svelte 5 and follows best practices for Svelte development.
Our project uses Tailwind CSS 4 for styling.
When generating CSS, please follow Tailwind CSS 4 syntax and features.
When generating CSS, please ensure that the generated code is compatible with Tailwind CSS 4 and follows best practices for Tailwind development.
